mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.x_axis as t_x_axis, t.y_axis as t_y_axis, t.hall_id as t_hall_id, t.seat_state as t_seat_state
mapper.insert: insert into seat (id, x_axis, y_axis, hall_id, seat_state) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{xAxis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yAxis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seatState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
